tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (PP (IN At) (NP (NP (NP (NNP CHEO)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NNP MRI))) (NP-TMP (DT this) (NN morning))) (: -) (NP (NP (VBG Striking) (NN reminder)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (SBAR (IN if) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP do) (RB n't) (VP (VB have) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ sick) (NN child)) (PP (IN @) (NP (NNP CHEO)))) (ADVP (RB then)))))) (NP (PRP you)) (VP (MD ca) (RB n't) (VP (VB be) (VP (VBG having) (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (JJ bad) (NN day)))))))))))
